metadata.title: CVE-2023-46046 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in MiniZinc before 2.8.0 allows a NULL pointer dereference viati_expr in a crafted .mzn file. NOTE: this is disputed because there is nocommon libminizinc use case in which an unattended process is supposed torun forever to process a series of atttacker-controlled .mzn files.

criterions.comment: minizinc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
